title: Number of blank and questionable ballots; record of
context: ยง16-27 Number of blank and questionable ballots; record of. In addition to the count of the valid ballots, the precinct officials shall, as to each separate official ballot, also determine and record the number of totally blank ballots and the number of questionable ballots. [L 1970, c 26, pt of ยง2; am L 1973, c 217, ยง6(e)]
